TheseAreComments!.Comment: 'capacity' in 'FotaCapability' is the largest size of all images in one fota processing (0-4MB;1-8MB)!
'diffMode' in 'FotaCapability' is the flag for handling compressed section(s) in binary file (0-no zip;1-has zip)!
'attr' in 'SysImageMem' must be set with one of these choices('BINPKG/AP/CP/APP/APP2/SYSH'), which are forbidden to be redefined!
'attr' in 'ExtenOtaMem' must be set with one of these choices('EF/SD'), which are forbidden to be redefined!
'name' in 'StorageDevice' must be set with one of these choices('AP/CP/EF/SD'), which are forbidden to be redefined!
'base' in 'StorageDevice' is the global unique starting address, and it can not be modified!
However, other fields can be redefined to whatever you want, including the name of this config file!
